meanings.definition: A person who works on a barge.
meanings.sent1: The bargees unloaded cargo from the barge.
meanings.sent2: The bargees navigated the river with skill.
meanings.sent3: The bargees joked about having a floating office.
meanings.sent4: The bargees were the unsung heroes of the river.
meanings.sent5: The bargees' hard work kept the barge moving smoothly.

meanings.sent1: We saw a group of bargees working together.
meanings.sent2: The bargees waved to us from the deck.
meanings.sent3: The bargees formed a line to pass the cargo efficiently.
meanings.sent4: The bargees' unity was evident in their synchronized movements.
meanings.sent5: The bargees' camaraderie made the work enjoyable.
